prod_short_desc: Cruise into the jungle and make a big discovery!
prod_long_desc:
Discover what lurks on the banks of the river in the LEGO® City jungle with the Jungle Starter Set, featuring a boat with space for gear and 3 minifigures, a tree with hidden treasure, camera and a working magnifying glass. Includes 3 minifigures, plus snake, frog and crocodile figures.
Includes 3 minifigures: a jungle explorer, scientist and a boat pilot, plus crocodile, snake and frog figures.
Features a boat with space for 3 minifigures and exploration gear.
Also includes a tree with opening door and space for hidden treasure elements.
Study the colorful frog more closely with the working magnifying glass.
Open the door in the tree and discover the hidden treasure!
Accessory elements include 3 gold-colored coins, box, camera, magnifying glass and a machete.
Boat measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
Tree measures over 2” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
Crocodile figure measures over 4” long.
